articles.author: ICC
articles.title: Rohit Sharma breaks silence for first time since CWC23 Final - ICC Cricket
articles.description: India captain Rohit Sharma has spoken out for the first time since his side suffered defeat in the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup 2023 Final against Australia.
articles.content: India captain Rohit Sharma has spoken out for the first time since his side suffered defeat in the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup 2023 Final against Australia.India embarked on a dream journey in the IC… [+5127 chars]
